lead_intro: Have you ever wondered about the impact of stolen videos on social media platforms like Facebook? Dive into the world of online content creation and theft with this insightful transcript!

quiz.question: How many of the 1000 most-viewed videos on Facebook were stolen in the first quarter of 2015?
quiz.explanation: The transcript mentions that 725 out of the 1000 most-viewed videos on Facebook were stolen in the first quarter of 2015.

quiz.question: How long does Facebook count a view, even if the video is muted?
quiz.explanation: A view on Facebook is counted after three seconds, even if the video is muted.

quiz.question: What is the term used to describe the stealing of videos on Facebook?
quiz.explanation: The transcript highlights the issue of 'Freebooting,' which refers to the stealing of videos on Facebook.
